Package org.displaytag.export

Class FopExportView

java.lang.Object
org.displaytag.export.FopExportView
All Implemented Interfaces:
BinaryExportView, ExportView
public class FopExportView extends Object implements BinaryExportView
Exports the data to a totaled xml format, and then transforms that data using XSL-FO to a pdf. The stylesheet can be fed in as a string from the property export.pdf.fo.stylesheetbody, or you can use a default stylesheet named by the property export.pdf.fo.stylesheet. When you are developing a stylesheet, this class will output the raw FO if you set your log level to debug, which is very handy if you are getting errors or unexpected pdf output. See asFo_us.xsl for a sample XSL-FO stylesheet. The basic structure of the intermediate XML is 
 <table>
   <header>
     <header-cell>AntColumn</header-cell>
   </header>
   <data>
     <subgroup grouped-by="0">
       <row>
         <cell grouped="true">Ant</cell>
       </row>
       <subtotal>
         <subtotal-cell> </subtotal-cell>
       </subtotal>
     </subgroup>
   </data>
 </table>
Author:
rapruitt Date: Aug 26, 2009 Time: 1:55:29 PM
See Also:
